displayName.text: Find the Light Photography - (Bjorn Bolinder Photography)

formattedAddress: Cabrini Blvd, New York, NY 10033, USA

authorAttributions.displayName: Find the Light - Photography by Bjorn Bolinder
Find the Light - Photography by Bjorn Bolinder

adrFormatAddress: Cabrini Blvd, New York, NY 10033, USA

originalText.text: Bjorn photographed our wedding on May 22, 2022. It was a small family-only event, so we wanted a single photographer who would be unobtrusive. Bjorn was terrific. Starting with his initial response to my preliminary email inquiries, he was thoughtful and sensitive: he emphasized that he wanted to do whatever we wanted, but he also offered helpful suggestions based on his experience. During the event, he was definitely inconspicuous, but he was also a comfortable presence. The photos he took not only are technically gorgeous, but they capture the spirit of the day beautifully. I have gotten so many compliments on the ones that I posted online. In short, it was a pleasure to work with Bjorn and the results were everything I could have wanted. I can't recommend him highly enough.

originalText.text: We were incredibly lucky to have Bjorn as our wedding photographer this past weekend. He's a brilliant photographer, capturing the best moments and he truly does find the light. The photos are vibrant and stunning! In addition to being a wonderful photographer, he's also one of the kindest people I know. He had such a calm, friendly energy all through the wedding and helped us feel confident and happy. I couldn't recommend him more highly. Find the Light Photography was perfect!!

text.text: We were incredibly lucky to have Bjorn as our wedding photographer this past weekend. He's a brilliant photographer, capturing the best moments and he truly does find the light. originalText.text: Bjorn Bolinder is one of the best photographers and people you could ever work with. He is professional, but also so warm and fun. During the shoot he gave me helpful active direction, similar to a director in a play, so that I was truly acting in my shots and not just posing and emoting. That, I think, is the biggest and most important difference between a good photographer and an exceptional one, and Bjorn is quite exceptional.

text.text: Bjorn Bolinder is one of the best photographers and people you could ever work with. He is professional, but also so warm and fun. originalText.text: Bjorn is an AMAZING photographer! Not only am I 100% thrilled with my headshots and dance portraits, I had the most wonderful time during the shoot. He was very attentive and hospitable, and he asked all the right questions in order to fully understand what my goals were for my new pictures. He is a truly talented photographer and a lovely human to boot. Highly recommend!

text.text: Bjorn is an AMAZING photographer! Not only am I 100% thrilled with my headshots and dance portraits, I had the most wonderful time during the shoot. He was very attentive and hospitable, and he asked all the right questions in order to fully understand what my goals were for my new pictures. He is a truly talented photographer and a lovely human to boot. Highly recommend!

originalText.text: I loved working with Bjorn!! I am not generally comfortable in front of the camera, but I needed headshots for my website. Bjorn did a great job helping me relax and feel at ease. The whole process was seamless and even fun (!!). And the final photographs are incredible. I would recommend Bjorn to anyone - he truly has a gift.
